author: adilabd
title: Incrypture- Structured-FI Education
description: Incryptures Smart Structure protocol won't be viable without building a community of users.
solution: Video tutorials and social media outreach to educate the community on structured finance and the economic benefits of using this technology
experience: Incrypture has extensive experience in securitization technology. To bring this to Cardano we need marketing, education and awareness.
